CustomField.description:
This is used in the "Out to Market" email (SendGrid).
Opp Policy_Type_Status__c = New Business Opp Stage = Need to Submit Opp Record Type = Founder Shield Account Current_Client__c = false Dont send email = false
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Check this box if you do not want the Out to Market email to send to the client.
CustomField.label: Dont send email
